timeline.message:
Cleanup TransportRequestOptions Usage

A class with 2 fields does not need a builder, especially
when in many cases the builder result is just equivalent to the
`EMPTY` singleton to begin with.
Removed the builder and simplified related code accordingly.

timeline.bodyText:
I'd prefer this wasn't called of since this suggests there aren't any other options (and then it'd be weird to call it "options"). Does timeout() work?
Marks for brevity tho :) Not a strongly-held opinion, I can live with it.
